members.name: Kim Nam-Gil
members.txt: Sometimes You Win Sometimes You Learn : When I opened an old notebook with a coated four-leaf clover, looked just like me in high heels in a sheep's clothing smiling broadly.

members.name: Lee Da-Hee
members.txt: phone numbers of my acquaintances written on one side, and a faded photo next to it showed a young woman who looked just like me in high heels.

members.name: Cha Eun-Woo
members.txt: Inside the drawer, which had never been opened, there was a familiar smell of minutes between scarves, accessories, and various miscellaneous things.
